languages.text: "Сия печать чистоты, несущая бинарные шифры Деус Механикус, да послужит отметиной в честь победы над презренным Криком скверны. Да пребудет дух твоей брони в здравии и превозмогании".

"May this purity seal bearing the binharic ciphers of the Deus Mechanicus serve to commemorate your victory over the despicable Doomscream. May the spirit of your armour be in good health and vanquish all it encounters."
languages.original_text: "Сия печать чистоты, несущая бинарные шифры Деус Механикус, да послужит отметиной в честь победы над презренным Криком скверны. Да пребудет дух твоей брони в здравии и превозмогании".

traits.locale_text: "May this purity seal bearing the binary ciphers of the Deus Mechanicus serve to commemorate your victory over the despicable Balescream. May the spirit of your armour be in good health and vanquish all it encounters."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "May this purity seal bearing the binary ciphers of the Deus Mechanicus serve to commemorate your victory over the despicable Balescream. May the spirit of your armour be in good health and vanquish all it encounters."

traits.locale_text: "May this purity seal bearing the binharic ciphers of the Deus Mechanicus serve to commemorate your victory over the despicable Doomscream. May the spirit of your armour be in good health and vanquish all it encounters."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “愿这铭刻着万机之神二进制代码的纯洁印记，能纪念你战胜灾啸的光荣胜利。愿你动力甲的机魂安康，战胜一切来犯之敌。”
languages.original_text: "May this purity seal bearing the binharic ciphers of the Deus Mechanicus serve to commemorate your victory over the despicable Doomscream. May the spirit of your armour be in good health and vanquish all it encounters."

traits.locale_text: “愿这铭刻着万机之神二进制代码的纯洁印记，能纪念你战胜灾啸的光荣胜利。愿你动力甲的机魂安康，战胜一切来犯之敌。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous décerne ce sceau de pureté gravé du code binhaire du Deus Mechanicus en hommage à votre victoire sur le misérable Fléau Hurlant. Que l'esprit de votre armure demeure fort et triomphe de tous vos adversaires. »
languages.original_text: "May this purity seal bearing the binharic ciphers of the Deus Mechanicus serve to commemorate your victory over the despicable Doomscream. May the spirit of your armour be in good health and vanquish all it encounters."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous décerne ce sceau de pureté gravé du code binhaire du Deus Mechanicus en hommage à votre victoire sur le misérable Fléau Hurlant . Que l'esprit de votre armure demeure fort et triomphe de tous vos adversaires. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Que este sello de pureza con el cifrado binario del Deus Mechanicus sirva para conmemorar su victoria sobre el deleznable Doomscream. Que el espíritu de su armadura goce de buena salud y venza en todos sus encuentros».
languages.original_text: "May this purity seal bearing the binharic ciphers of the Deus Mechanicus serve to commemorate your victory over the despicable Doomscream. May the spirit of your armour be in good health and vanquish all it encounters."

traits.locale_text: «Que este sello de pureza con el cifrado binario del Deus Mechanicus sirva para conmemorar su victoria sobre el deleznable Balescream. Que el espíritu de su armadura goce de buena salud y venza en todos sus encuentros».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この純潔の印章にはデウス・メカニクスのバイナリ暗号が施されており、忌まわしきドゥームスクリームに勝利した記念となろう。そのアーマーの精霊が良好な状態を保ち、出遭うものすべてを殲滅せんことを」
languages.original_text: "May this purity seal bearing the binharic ciphers of the Deus Mechanicus serve to commemorate your victory over the despicable Doomscream. May the spirit of your armour be in good health and vanquish all it encounters."

traits.locale_text: 「この純潔の印章にはデウス・メカニクスのバイナリ暗号が施されており、忌まわしきベイルスクリームに勝利した記念となろう。そのアーマーの精霊が良好な状態を保ち、出遭うものすべてを殲滅せんことを」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Möge dieses Reinheitssiegel mit den binhärische Chiffren des Deus Mechanicus als Erinnerung an den Sieg über den schändlichen Unheilsschrei dienen. Möge der Geist Eurer Rüstung bei guter Gesundheit sein und alles besiegen, worauf er trifft."
languages.original_text: "May this purity seal bearing the binharic ciphers of the Deus Mechanicus serve to commemorate your victory over the despicable Doomscream. May the spirit of your armour be in good health and vanquish all it encounters."

traits.locale_text: "Möge dieses Reinheitssiegel mit den binären Chiffren des Deus Mechanicus als Erinnerung an den Sieg über den schändlichen Unheilsschrei dienen. Möge der Geist Eurer Rüstung bei guter Gesundheit sein und alles besiegen, worauf er trifft."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "May this purity seal bearing the binharic ciphers of the Deus Mechanicus serve to commemorate your victory over the despicable Doomscream. May the spirit of your armour be in good health and vanquish all it encounters."

languages.text: "Deus Mechanicus'un ikilidil parolalarını taşıyan bu saflık mührü, alçak Belanarası'na karşı kazandığın zaferin anısına var olsun. Zırhının ruhu güçlensin ve karşısına çıkan her şeyi yok etme gücü kazansın."
languages.original_text: "May this purity seal bearing the binharic ciphers of the Deus Mechanicus serve to commemorate your victory over the despicable Doomscream. May the spirit of your armour be in good health and vanquish all it encounters."

traits.locale_text: "Deus Mechanicus'un ikilidilli parolalarını taşıyan bu saflık mührü, alçak Belanarası'na karşı kazandığın zaferin anısına var olsun. Zırhının ruhu güçlensin ve karşısına çıkan her şeyi yok etme gücü kazansın."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
